chunks.title: React
chunks.text: React 2 years of experience Frontend design for Software Portfolio (this website), Rollodex Capstone, Quester2000. Rollodex - Implemented various components to build templated forms and redesign search/filter UI. Portfolio - Implemented a wide suite of custom UI components.

chunks.title: HTML
chunks.text: HTML 5 years of experience Web design for Web Development & Design Foundations coursework, Software Portfolio (this website), Rollodex Capstone, Quester2000. Built legacy style websites using HTML and CSS to display information and navigate between pages. Integrated with JavaScript, TypeScript, and React to build complex web apps.

chunks.title: CSS
chunks.text: CSS 5 years of experience UI design for Software Portfolio (this website), Rollodex Capstone, Quester2000, Various courses. Created themes for web applications to customize and improve accessibility.

chunks.title: JavaScript
chunks.text: JavaScript 3 years of experience Backend logic for Software Portfolio (this website), Rollodex Capstone, Quester2000. Built client/server logic to power complex features, such as menu interfaces, search filtering, and form templates.

chunks.title: TypeScript
chunks.text: TypeScript 6 months of experience Backend logic for Software Portfolio (this website), Quester2000. Built web apps meant to run on cloud services.

chunks.title: C
chunks.text: C 3 years of experience Coursework for various courses. SER334 - Built a Loadable Kernel Module that uses Linux data structures to display details about the processes executing in the kernel. Applied scripting for various topics such as thread/compiler optimization, page replacement, image processing, and scheduling algorithms.

chunks.title: C++
chunks.text: C++ 7 years of experience Core language foundation. Used for custom game engine and many small projects. Developed a custom game engine for a current project. (Limited information disclosure) The language that I first learned and my top preference.

chunks.title: Java
chunks.text: Java 7 years of experience Distributed systems teaching, Minecraft modding, Various courses/projects. Built a Wheel of Fortune Java client/server assignment for students. Decompiled code to patch a crash and reassemble.

chunks.title: Linux
chunks.text: Linux 7 years of experience My daily driver kernel, set up on many systems. Also used for various courses. Actively maintaining Nextcloud and game servers with backups and monitoring. Configured VFIO and kernel tuning for GPU passthrough to VMs.

chunks.title: JSON
chunks.text: JSON 5 years of experience Modding, Game Engine, Various courses. Stored complex application objects to file, and read them back upon application reload. Commonly used when modding Stellaris and Minecraft.

chunks.title: Bash
chunks.text: Bash 5 years of experience Local tooling on Linux systems Scripting to modify various behaviors of Linux machines. Used heavily during application development.

chunks.title: XML
chunks.text: XML 5 years of experience Game mod configuration, Various courses Patched Minecraft config XMLs to optimize servers and align with modpack updates. Deploy virtual machines and optimize them.

chunks.title: KVM
chunks.text: KVM 4 years of experience Virtualize Windows on Linux systems Set up Windows 10 virtual machines optimized for gaming, with GPU passthrough. Used with QEMU.

chunks.title: QEMU
chunks.text: QEMU 4 years of experience Virtualize Windows on Linux systems Set up Windows 10 virtual machines optimized for gaming, with GPU passthrough. Used with KVM.

chunks.title: PostgreSQL
chunks.text: PostgreSQL 2 years of experience Rollodex, Quester2000 Modeled contact/search data to support fast filtering. Stored app data for user accounts.

chunks.title: SQL
chunks.text: SQL 2 years of experience Rollodex, SER322 - Database Management course Designed Retail Inventory Management system for SER322. Used queries to troubleshoot and speed up search for Rollodex.

chunks.title: Lua
chunks.text: Lua 2 years of experience Stellaris Modding Built gameplay scripts and UI hooks for custom content. Iterated on mod changes to improve balance.

chunks.title: Prisma
chunks.text: Prisma 2 years of experience Rollodex, Quester2000 Managed schema migrations and models for database structure.

chunks.title: Oracle Cloud
chunks.text: Oracle Cloud 2 years of experience WireGuard experiments with intermediate IP Set up a ping point to create a secure connection to my home server.

chunks.title: AWS
chunks.text: AWS 2 years of experience Server deployment for various projects Used to host client-server applications for SER321.

chunks.title: cpp-game-engine
chunks.text: cpp-game-engine

chunks.title: Indie game development
chunks.text: Indie game development Fullstack Engineer Building a C++ game engine and story driven RPG adventure. Implemented core engine loops, asset loading, vertex buffers, and JSON data structures. Experimented with tooling such as OpenGL, SDL, and Dear ImGui.

chunks.title: minecraft-mods
chunks.text: minecraft-mods

chunks.title: minecraft-mods
chunks.text: minecraft-mods

chunks.title: Portfolio (this website)
chunks.text: Portfolio (this website) Solo Fullstack Engineer Designed and built a personalized engineering portfolio with localization, accessibility, telemetry-ready structure, and custom UI components. Shipped en/ja/zh localization with shared content definitions to keep information consistent. Built a custom component set with theme/contrast controls and accessibility guardrails. Centered performance and observability with critical CSS, edge rendering, and structured data.

chunks.title: Portfolio (this website) - Personal project
chunks.text: Portfolio (this website) - Personal project Solo AI-Assisted Fullstack Engineer Designed and built a personalized engineering portfolio with localization, accessibility, basic telemetry, and custom UI components. Instructed Codex to perform complex tasks based on high level documentation and a detailed Work Breakdown Structure. Full en/ja/zh localization with centralized content definitions to keep information consistent. Built a custom component set with theme/contrast controls and accessibility guardrails. Centered performance and observability with critical CSS, edge rendering, and structured data.

chunks.title: quester2000
chunks.text: quester2000

chunks.title: Quester2000 - Personal project
chunks.text: Quester2000 - Personal project Fullstack Engineer Created a point tracking to-do list tool that promotes self discipline and rewarding. Designed a database schema for storing user credentials, custom quests, and custom items. Implemented a flexible frontend UI, designed to work on a variety of systems. Became familiar with modern tooling used to create a modern web app.

chunks.title: Rollodex for Appy.yo
chunks.text: Rollodex for Appy.yo Co-lead Fullstack Developer Co-led a remote fullstack development team, developing a contact management tool. Took ownership of API/data integrations and accessibility, while maintaining the repo as Git master across two-week Scrum releases. Designed APIs and database schemas, templated forms, and rebuilt search/filter logic & UI. Cut search latency from ~5s to ~200ms while maintaining repo practices, docs, and two-week sprints.

chunks.title: Rollodex for Appy.yo
chunks.text: Rollodex for Appy.yo Co-lead Fullstack Developer Co-led a remote fullstack development team, developing a contact management tool. Took ownership of API/data integrations and accessibility, while maintaining the repo as Git master across two-week Scrum releases. Designed APIs and database schemas, templated forms, and rebuilt search/filter logic & UI. Cut search latency from ~5s to ~200ms while maintaining repo practices, docs, and two-week sprints.

chunks.title: SER 321 at Arizona State University
chunks.text: SER 321 at Arizona State University Undergraduate Teaching Assistant for Distributed Software Systems course Designed and coded an assignment; a “Wheel of Fortune” Java server supporting a dynamic amount of concurrent clients. Mentored students in designing distributed systems hosted on AWS and debugging client-server architectures. Actively answered student questions on Slack discussion boards, and hosted office hours once per week. Assisted in debugging complex issues with code logic, networking, threading, AWS deployment, Ubuntu, and virtualization.

chunks.title: SER 321 at Arizona State University
chunks.text: SER 321 at Arizona State University Undergraduate Teaching Assistant for Distributed Software Systems course Designed and coded an assignment; a “Wheel of Fortune” Java server supporting a dynamic amount of concurrent clients. Mentored students in designing distributed systems hosted on AWS and debugging client-server architectures. Actively answered student questions on Slack discussion boards, and hosted office hours once per week. Assisted in debugging complex issues with code logic, networking, threading, AWS deployment, Ubuntu, and virtualization.

chunks.title: Freelance / Mods
chunks.text: Freelance / Mods Mod developer (Stellaris & Minecraft) Maintain a handful of Minecraft and Stellaris mods, plus high performance heavily modded private servers. Built custom mod features and balance tweaks for Stellaris and Minecraft. Operate game servers and customize modpacks with ongoing profiling and tuning.

chunks.title: Freelance / Mods
chunks.text: Freelance / Mods Mod developer (Stellaris & Minecraft) Maintain a handful of Minecraft and Stellaris mods, plus high performance heavily modded private servers. Built custom mod features and balance tweaks for Stellaris and Minecraft. Operate game servers and customize modpacks with ongoing profiling and tuning.

chunks.text: template-project

chunks.title: Resume overview
chunks.text: Fullstack engineer delivering modern web apps, automation tools, and distributed systems from brief to steady-state operations. Finish the rows I start; own delivery end to end, keep systems reliable, and back claims with live artifacts. Translate ambiguous requirements into production-ready fullstack solutions. Keep repositories orderly with disciplined branching, reviews, and documentation. Mentor peers through distributed systems challenges while modeling reliable operations. Undergraduate Teaching Assistant, SER 321 (Distributed Software Systems) Arizona State University Led distributed systems lab content, authored Java client-server assignment on AWS, and coached cohorts through debugging complex network architectures. Designed and shipped a graded Java client-server assignment adopted by course faculty. Hosted support sessions covering AWS deployment, concurrency, and interface design. Maintained alignment with faculty and graduate TAs via Slack triage and weekly syncs. Industrial Technician Captech Logistics Improve packaging operations and maintain production hardware in a high-throughput logistics environment. Implemented workflow adjustments that increased packaging throughput. Troubleshoot and maintain industrial systems to minimize downtime. Digital Fabrication Intern BAM Logistics Produced signage and prototypes via CNC laser cutter, converting digital designs into physical deliverables. Developed designs in Inkscape to support fabrication requests. Managed end-to-end fabrication process ensuring accuracy and safety. C++ (expert), Java (expert), JavaScript (advanced), TypeScript (intermediate), C (advanced), Python (intermediate), SQL (intermediate), Lua (intermediate), React (intermediate), Node.js (intermediate), Prisma (intermediate), Express (intermediate), PyTorch (beginner), TensorFlow (beginner)
